name: Swan Song (TBD Game Studio)
description:
TBD takes a dive into narrative-driven games, as Swan Song brings the player into the life of a wind-battered sailor on his final voyage. Manning the ship alone, he has nothing but the breeze, his memories, and his kalimba for company. Discover the natural melodies of the sea and relive the stories of days long gone in this peaceful musical simulation.

For more information about the team and our other projects, visit us at our website!

If you have any questions, please send them to us at tbdgamestudio@gmail.com
